Plot: A documentary that follows former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich as he looks to raise awareness of the country's widening economic gap.
Title: Inequality for All
Actors: Lily Tomlin, Dolly Parton, Candice Bergen, Tyne Daly
tomatoConsensus: While it arrives in a glut of similarly themed documentaries, Inequality for All distinguishes itself with a compelling presentation of an important message, as well as much-needed splashes of wit.
